inputs.title: Trajectory points column
inputs.description: Column containing the points for each trajectory

inputs.name: speed_threshold
inputs.title: Speed Threshold
inputs.description: Maximum speed to consider an outlier. If the resulting trajectory is invalid (e.g. <2 points remaining), the original trajectory is returned together with a warning

inputs.title: Distance units
inputs.description: Unit for the computation of the distance

inputs.description: Unit for the computation of the time

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the cleaned trajectories
